item.description:
This is from The New Hampshire 912 Project (Manchester, NH)--Thanks Kristin

OPERATION Can You Hear Us Now is spreading among the grassroots folks across America! May October 17th be a day we let the media never forget - a day when we marched to their front door and called them the "traitors" to the Republic they are. So much for "watchdogs" - they're "lapdogs of the left." Their silence is their consent...

Well America, let's see who's "bark" is louder...

Imagine hundreds and thousands, maybe MILLIONS of freedom-loving, tax-paying Americans "surrounding" the media all around the country!

Kristin Noble has stepped up and offered to help plan this event. I'm sure she would love any and all help necessary to make this event a success. Here is the website that has started the grass root movement
http://www.operationc....

Let's give The NH 912 Project (Manchester) our support!

More details to come......................................
item.name: Operation: Can You Hear Us Now?
